page.title: 07Old residents in Oakley
page.content: Most of the old people have lived in Oakley all their lives.During this time Oakley has got bigger.There was always a school but previously in School Lane.During the war no houses were bombed,but everybody had to carry a gas mask. The village hall was known as the library and was used for socials by the Oakley Brass Band,which no longer exists.Dances were held frequently.Nowadays the village hall is situated in the playing field and used for the Darby and Joan club. The elderly have memories of the Doctor jogging round to his patients !The old people miss the shops that used to be in Oakley in particular the sweet shop,grocers,general store and bakers - now combined into a P.O.and a separate supermarket.
